Why Choose Kintetic Elevator?

Specializing in Life in Motion!

Kinetic is a full service vertical transportation company serving Maryland, Delaware and Pennsylvania. Our company is centrally positioned around our core values of integrity, loyalty, trust, and responsibility. Our team of expert technicians is uniquely suited to work on your church's wheelchair lift, your regional hospital, or anything in between. We perform maintenance, installation, modernization, repair, and inspections on all make and models.

View Recent Projects
